divs: Sighting DetailsGetting ready for bed Two glowing objects that I could see from my window Possible air craft One coming from south and other from northeast slow moving no sound very peaceful two objects came together and then flew away quickly I was excited and sent my wife in to get camera Both objects flew away out of sight
